ModMetaData.name: Firestarter
ModMetaData.author: Why_is_that
ModMetaData.description:
I'm a firestarter, twisted firestarter. You're a firestarter, twisted firestarter.
Early Release. More to come but beware of pesky bugs.
Features: - `Greek fire` buildable floor material. Requires 1 chem fuel. When lit burns extremely hot and is not extinguished by rain. - `Firestarter` ability. Pawns can start fires when drafted. - Configuration settings for `Firestarter` ability, limiting it to Pyromaniacs or even disabling it. - Changes to fire logic to make these mechanics work better.
